forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with light rain early. A mix of sun and clouds by afternoon. High 12C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. Showers this morning with clearing during the afternoon hours. High 53F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers late. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and wind. Rain may be heavy late. Low 13C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected. Higher wind gusts possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 54F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected. Higher wind gusts possible.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. Potential for heavy rainfall. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Potential for heavy rainfall. High 58F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 12C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy. A steady rain in the evening, with showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 47F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 53F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 41F. Winds NNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 13C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 54F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 56F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. SSE winds shifting to W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
